item.description:
1. "It's a pity": Zelensky says Trump gave Putin what he wanted  Axios
  2. Zelenskyy says Trump's Alaska summit 'gave Putin what he wanted'  ABC News
  3. Zelenskyy accuses Trump of giving Putin 'what he wanted' at Alaska summit  Fox News
  4. Zelenskyy reaffirms Ukraine will not cede territory, calls for binding security guarantees  Anadolu Ajansı
  5. Zelenskyy says Ukraine wins as long as Putin fails to occupy it  RBC-Ukraine
